    • Method Detail

      • onJoinChannel

        public void onJoinChannel(java.lang.String server,
                 java.lang.String channel)
        Called when a user wishes to join a channel on a server that has already been connected to. Adds the appropriate title choice, sets the channel to activeChannel and adds the appropriate user list and output panels. Finally adds the channel node to the connection tree.
        Specified by:
        onJoinChannel in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        server - Name of the server that the channel resides on.
        channel - Name of the channel that is to be joined.

      • onJoinServer

        public void onJoinServer(java.lang.String server)
        Must be called when a server is joined. It will create the default channel for console messages, add a server node to the connection tree and make sure joinedAServer is set to true. Also sets the activeServer as the newly joined server.
        Specified by:
        onJoinServer in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        server - The name of the server that is to be joined.

      • onLeaveServer

        public void onLeaveServer(java.lang.String server)
        Must be called when a server is left. It removes the appropriate outputPanel and userListPanel from the outputPanels and userListPanels array lists.
        Specified by:
        onLeaveServer in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        server - The name of the server that is to be left.

      • onNewMessage

        public void onNewMessage(java.lang.String server,
                java.lang.String channel,
                java.lang.String message)
        Called when a message is received. It takes in the server name, the channel name, and the actual message. ChatWindow has a channel for the server connection itself that is of the same name as the server. The server channel should receive messages that are command responses.
        Specified by:
        onNewMessage in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        server - The server that the channel is from.
        channel - The channel the message is from.
        message - The message that was received.

      • onNewPrivMessage

                    java.lang.String channel,

                    java.lang.String message)
        Specified by:
        onNewPrivMessage in interface Listener

      • onNewTopic

        public void onNewTopic(java.lang.String server,
              java.lang.String channel,
              java.lang.String topic)
        Adds a new topic to the topics ArrayList.
        Specified by:
        onNewTopic in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        server - The name of the server the topic came from.
        channel - The channel that the topic is from.
        topic - The topic of the channel/server.

      • onNickChange

        public void onNickChange(java.lang.String oldNick,
                java.lang.String newNick)
        Called when a user changes their nick.
        Specified by:
        onNickChange in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        oldNick - The original nick of the user.
        newNick - The new nick of a user.

      • onPartChannel

        public void onPartChannel(java.lang.String server,
                 java.lang.String channel)
        Called when a user leaves a channel. It removes the output panel, user list and the appropriate node from the connection tree.
        Specified by:
        onPartChannel in interface Listener
        Parameters:
        server - Name of the server that is being left.
        channel - Name of the channel that is being parted from.
